values.name: A. Any one of the epidemiological history with any of the clinical features
History of travel to or residence in communities where cases reported within the last 14 days
In contact with a patient who has fever or respiratory symptoms or from a community with confirmed cases reported within the last 14 days
B. Assessing the presence of at least two of the following clinical features
Differential CBC findings
values.description: White blood cells is normal or decreased, with decreased lymphocytic count.

values.name: C. Severe Acute Respiratory Infection (SARI) with no other obvious cause
Severe Acute Respiratory Infection (SARI) with other obvious cause for SARI

references.citation: Masoud, Hossam & Elassal, Gehan & Zaky, Samy & Baki, Amin & Ibrahem, Hamdy & Amin, Wagdy & Abdelbary, Akram & Abdalmohsen, Ahmad & Hassany, Mohamed & Eid, Alaa & Asem, Noha & Kamal, Ehab. (2020). Management Protocol for COVID-19 Patients Version 1.4/30th May 2020 Ministry of health and population (MOHP), Egypt.
